text: Pamulaparti Venkata Narasimha Rao (28 June 1921 â€“ 23 December 2004) was an Indian lawyer and politician. He was the 9th Prime Minister of India from 1991 to 1996.. Indian PM's official website. Retrieved 2 March 2007. He was born in Vangara, Hyderabad State, British India (now in Telangana, India). Rao died of a heart attack at a hospital in New Delhi on 23 December 2004 at the age of 83.Narasimha Rao passes away at the age of 83 . Hindu.com (24 December 2004). title: P. V. Narasimha Rao
